<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potent Poisoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=112) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[powerful alchemy](/Classes.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist. When you craft an alchemical item with the [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) trait by any means, the DC is increased by up to 4, to a maximum of your class DC.
name: Potent Poisoner
